EXTRACTED VALUE: For the next iteration, we want the option to turn off the sepia tone and more gameplay modes, but the gameplay itself is nearly perfect.
This is the best version of the NBA 2k series in a long time. It’s a fresh breath of air and I am glad to see where the series is heading.
A must-have RPG for all those who complain that the Xbox 360 doesn't have any, and proof that Mistwalker can deliver great games.
A superb and strikingly polished game.
The game’s animations are incredibly fluid with new and realistic animations for the many catches, throws and tackles.
Throw in a nice selection of Achievements for you Gamerscore junkies, and you have a nice little package, very attractive for the price.
Tomb Raider: Legend is about as good as games get right now. [May 2006, p.43]
